tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is an amazing doctor. I visited him for my periods pain which I have been getting for years. I explained the doctor about my pain and he told me that I have endrometriosis. I did not give him any ultrasound and any other reports but after few months I did show on my ultrasound that I have this problem. I decided to go for the surgery and I wanted to do it only through him as he was the only doctor could tell me the actual problem and none other could do in so many years. I did go to so many doctors but all they could say is it’s hormonal problem and some women get pain. I was so frustrated all these years for not knowing what’s wrong and why do I need to go through such a severe pain. He did my surgery and it’s been 3 days I’m am recovering. *** * *** *** ** **** ** ** * ********* *************** I am sure I will be feeling much better from now.

I have been struggling with this problem since long. Have consult female gynaecologist of Apollo who treated me really well but couldn’t be able to solve this. I was in discomfort pain since 8 months finally came to Practo n searched good doctors for this n there I read reviews about dr Bijoy. ***** ** ****** ** ******** he solved my problem very easily. M really happy now n Healthy too. Must recommend to everyone. He’s amazing doctor

I was suffering  from severe abdomen pain.Then i consulted a local doctor and he recommended a ultrasound and a CECT and I got to know  about ovarian cyst. I was so worried.Later  by the recommendation of my father's colleague i visited Dr Bijoy Nayak he was  explicit about my case and talked nicely.Before and after my surgery he came to meet. He was so generous to me all while.I must say he is an amazing  doctors I have ever met with  full of positive vibes and good sense of humour.

I have taken appointment and visited the hospital, Doctor was good like in terms going check up and giving the treatment. We are happy with the doctor but it very difficult to get the appointment timing for us in the hospital. If it will be better me it will be useful for many people

Dr Bijoy Kumar Nayak has to be one the best of his field. Me and my wife were very tensed due to huge ovarian cysts in both her ovaries, she also had fibroid in her uterus . But after meeting Bijoy sir we felt really confident. He correctly diagnosed it as endometriosis and performed laparoscopic surgery. Everything went really  smooth and my wife has recovered quite well. I would recommend him to everyone *** ****** ***** * **** *************

visited for complex ovarian cystademona cyst*** ** *** ******* 
i had complex ovarian cyst of 15-16 cm and i worried too much that i lost almost 9-10 kgs in 2 mnths . i m just 24 n unmarried trust me he is the one who will do justice to your problem, where everyone told me this complex mass only can be removed by open surgery there he is one among 5-7 peoples who said it can be removed by laproscopy .its my 3rd day post surgery n i m recovering .he saved my life .i was suffering since march now i feel blessed to have him as my doctor .very kind n polite person and cool
too.
** ***** ***** ***** ** ****  ****  ****** *** very  friendly  he is given  sufficient  time to his patients  properly  check the  patients .finally  we are fully satisfied with  doctor advised.
